properties.displayName: Configure Azure PaaS services to use private DNS zones
properties.description: This policy initiative is a group of policies that ensures private endpoints to Azure PaaS services are integrated with Azure Private DNS zones

metadata.description: The subscription id where the private DNS zones are deployed. If this is specified, it will override any individual private DNS zone resource ids specified.
The resource group where the private DNS zones are deployed. If this is specified, it will override any individual private DNS zone resource ids specified.
The resource type where the private DNS zones are deployed. If this is specified, it will override any individual private DNS zone resource ids specified.
The region where the private DNS zones are deployed. If this is specified, it will override any individual private DNS zone resource ids specified.
Mapping of region to private DNS zone resource id. If the region is not specified, the default private DNS zone resource id will be used.
The list of private DNS zone names to be used for the Azure PaaS services.
Enable or disable the execution of the policy
Enable or disable the execution of the policy
